wikipedia_page.main: James Lloyd (5 July 1939 – 22 March 2013) was an English boxer. He won a bronze medal in the welterweight division at the 1960 Olympics, losing in the semifinals to the eventual winner Nino Benvenuti. He fought under the names Jim Lloyd and Jimmy Lloyd.

response: *Jimmy Lloyd, recording pseudonym of Jimmie Logsdon (1922–2001), American singer
